About This Tool

This comprehensive debt management tool is designed specifically for German SMEs to help them make informed financial decisions.

Our tools help you:

  • Calculate sustainable debt levels based on your income
  • Analyze the true cost of borrowing
  • Optimize your debt repayment strategy
  • Find available funding opportunities
  • Monitor debt covenant compliance

Important Notice

Dieses Tool dient nur zu Bildungszwecken. Konsultieren Sie Finanzexperten für Beratung.
